posts.post_content:
Posted By: Joe Drouillard
Hello Everyone,

If you want a really good looking Marquard portrait cheap--then this card with a clipped corner is for you. $40.00 delivered. WOULD ALSO CONSIDER A TRADE FOR PSA 3/4 or SGC 40/50 COMMON THAT I DON'T HAVE.

[IMG]http://i100.photobucket.com/albums/m10/northviewcats/MarquardFront.jpg[/IMG]
[IMG]http://i100.photobucket.com/albums/m10/northviewcats/MarquardReverse.jpg[/IMG]

First email saying I'll take it--gets it.

Thanks,

Joe
